pages.title: Equip Generation
pages.text: All mobs are generated with:$(br)$(li)Random TCon armor + weapon$(br)$(li)Random classic armor set + weapon$(br2)Chance that mob will have at least 1 equipment is$(br)$(li)80% base chance$(br)$(li)20% less in $(l)Overworld/$$(br)$(li)35% added to reroll for each next slot

pages.title: Equip Generation
pages.text: Different mobs have different armor types and different TCon materials.$(br)$(l)Zombies/$ have static chance to spawn with any avaliable material.$(br2)Roll used $(l)qubic/$ function, so $(l)Paper/$ would spawn $(l)~20%/$ times and $(l)Gelid Metal/$ $(l)~0.3%/$ times.

pages.title: Equip Generation
pages.text: Mobs will never spawn with this TCon materials:$(br)$(li)paper$(br)$(li)chocolate$(br)$(li)ma.superium$(br)$(li)ma.supremium$(br)$(li)spectre$(br)$(li)draconic_metal$(br)$(li)neutronium$(br)$(li)aethium$(br)$(li)chaotic_metal$(br)$(li)infinity_metal

pages.title: Equip Generation
pages.text: Tinker's armor and tools have chance to get random modifier. If this happen, item 100% would have additional $(l)Creative/$ modifier.$(br)All equipment generated already damaged, so no exploits with $(l)mob-stripping farm/$!
